quotes.name: Claude Mokbel
quotes.quote: Sometimes it's better to count your hatches before they egg.

quotes.name: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't, you're right.

quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett
quotes.quote: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.

quotes.name: Germany Kent
quotes.quote: You become what you digest into your spirit. Whatever you think about, focus on, read about, talk about, you're going to attract more of into your life. Make sure they're all positive.

quotes.name: Joseph Campbell
quotes.quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us.

quotes.name: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm Possible!'
quotes.quote: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.name: Michelle Obama
quotes.quote: Am I good enough? Yes I am.

quotes.name: Gabby Bernstein
quotes.quote: I am worthy of what I desire.

quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway
quotes.quote: Every day above earth is a good day.

quotes.name: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: Nothing can dim the light that shines from within.

quotes.name: Hellen Keller
quotes.quote: Be happy with what you have while working for what you want.

quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.
quotes.quote: We mmust accept finite disappoinment, but never lose infinite hope.

quotes.name: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: I see failures as stepping stones.

quotes.name: James Baldwin
quotes.quote: Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced.

quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett
quotes.quote: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create.

quotes.name: Mark Manson
quotes.quote: Bravery is not the absence of fear. Bravery is feeling the fear, the doubt, the insecurity, and deciding that something else is more important.

quotes.name: Lao Tzu
quotes.quote: To the mind that is still, the whole world surrenders.

quotes.name: Desmond Tutu
quotes.quote: Do your little bit of good where you are; it's those little bits of good put together that overwhem the world.

quotes.name: Aesop
quotes.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.

quotes.name: Jimmy Dean
quotes.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.

quotes.name: Walt Whitman
quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.

quotes.name: Francis of Assisi
quotes.quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.

quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

quotes.name: Muhammad Ali
quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit.' Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.

quotes.name: Isaac Newton
quotes.quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.

quotes.name: Andre Gide
quotes.quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.

quotes.name: Ronald Regan
quotes.quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.

quotes.name: Warren Buffett
quotes.quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.

quotes.name: William Shakespeare
quotes.quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.

quotes.name: John Maynard Keynes
quotes.quote: Ideas shape the course of history.

quotes.name: Aristotle Onassis
quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.

quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.

quotes.name: Robert Frost
quotes.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood and I - I took the ones less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.

quotes.name: Rainer Maria Rilke
quotes.quote: The only journey is the one within.

quotes.name: Rosa Parks
quotes.quote: Memories of our lives, of our works and our deed will continue in others.

quotes.name: HArriet Beecher Stowe
quotes.quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.

quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale
quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.

quotes.name: Carol Burnett
quotes.quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.

quotes.name: Ella Fitzgerald
quotes.quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.

quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.

quotes.name: Aeschylus
quotes.quote: From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow.
